JobFullDesc: Cloud Ops EngineerDeloitte Consulting's Innovations & Platforms (I&P) team develops and hosts assets and accelerators that augment our leading services practice, and strike at the heart of our clients' business needs. Deloitte's commitment to innovation is inspiring our clients to new possibilities; our asset-based consulting agenda is designed to deliver tangible results in the near-term and sustainable competitive advantage for years to come. Are you looking for an organization with startup spirit or enterprise strength? Now you can have both! We are looking for talented individuals with an innovative mindset and technical skillset to join our growing team. Work you'll doThe Cloud Infrastructure Deployment Specialist will be responsible for design and deployment of scalable, reliable and secure cloud infrastructure. This individual must have a thorough understanding and experience with AWS, GCP. Azure is a plus. Must be an innovative problem solver, and visionary. The ideal candidate will have extensive knowledge in cloud architectures and operations procedures. The Cloud OPS Engineer will be focused on the following activities:Architect, deploy and administer cloud environment such as AWS, GCP, and Azure. focus on client facing workloads Coordinating deployments with project teams and collogues Responsible for managing and providing operational support of multiple cloud environments, including developing design Principles and for scalable, secure infrastructure Provide experience troubleshooting and remediating cloud issues, hands-on client project support , minimizing service impacting outages, & document issue resolution Researching and evaluating cloud technologies, tools, and capabilities to improve operational efficiencies and provide new services Develop strategy to automate and implement deployments wherever possible Work with operations teams to onboard cloud solutions Work with application owners, and solution groups to ensure proper architecture, function, and security standards are being followed for client projects and solutions in Deloitte's hosting ecosystem The team Deloitte Innovation & Platforms is an organization within Deloitte Consulting with the goal of building a culture of continuous innovation to drive profitable revenue through the identification, incubation, and actualization of breakthrough ideas in assets-based client offerings. The Cloud Hosting Infrastructure Team architects, deploys, and supports the cloud environments through the entire project lifecycle.QualificationsRequired:5+ years of relevant professional experience working in a large fast paced AWS, GCP, or Azure environment Bachelor-level degree in engineering, information technology, data communications, telecommunications, computer science, or equivalent educational or professional experience and/or qualifications Demonstrate expert experience with architecting, implementing, administering, and securing cloud environments Experienced in IaaS technologies such as EC2, EBS, S3, RDS, Elastic Load Balancing, beanstalk Experienced in management tools such as IAM, KMS, CloudWatch, CloudFormation, Quickstart, CloudTrail, Config, and Service Catalog Experience with networking and security, including NACLs, security groups, VPC peering, Transit Gateway, & Route 53 Experience with virtual devices such as firewalls, ELB, VPG, & internet gateways System Administrator experience in Linux and Windows Expert in AWS, Google, or Azure cloud computing technologies Knowledge of full lifecycle management of environments from deployment, through maintenance, to decommission Ability to work with service providers to enable managed services. Strong troubleshooting, problem solving, and issue management skills Knowledge of emerging cloud technology solutions, industry trends, and progressive operations methodology. Preferred ability and discipline to work and succeed in a fast pace and organizationally complex environment, to effectively adapt to rapidly changing technology, ability to lead and manage projects Excellent oral and written communications ability. Must be able to communicate effectively with all levels of the organization Preferred:Certifications in cloud technologies preferred Other operating systems on top of RedHat and Windows are a plus In Addition to AWS & GCP, knowledge in other cloud technologies such as Azure is a plus. #NBI22
